 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּשַׁט‎</span> **verb** ==strip off, make a dash, raid== (compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pašât‰u***</u></abbr>, ***expunge, obliterate***; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּשַׁט‎</span> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּשַׁט‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, are ***stretch out, extend, make plain***, so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Hos.7.1|Hos 7:1]] +, 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפָשַׁטְדָמתּ֫‎</span> [[Judg.9.33|Judg 9:33]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִפְשַׁט‎</span> [[1Sam.19.24|1Sam 19:24]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְשֹׁ֑טוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.26.1|Ezek 26:1]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּשֹׁ֫טָה‎</span> [[Isa.32.11|Isa 32:11]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּשְׁטִים‎</span> [[Neh.4.17|Neh 4:17]] — 

**1.** ***strip off, put off***, one's garment (accusative) [[1Sam.19.24|1Sam 19:24]]; [[Ezek.26.16|Ezek 26:16]]; [[Lev.6.4|Lev 6:4]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבַשׁ‎</span>), [[Lev.16.23|Lev 16:23]] (***id.***; both [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Neh.4.17|Neh 4:17]]; [[Song.5.3|Song 5:3]] accusative omitted [[Isa.32.11|Isa 32:11]] of locusts [[Nah.3.16|Nah 3:16]] ***stripping off*** (sheaths of wings, compare [[BDB#Da|Da]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] Amos.85). 

**2.** ***put off*** (one's shelter), i.e. ***make a dash*** (from a sheltered place), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> [[Judg.20.37|Judg 20:37]], absolute [[Judg.9.44|Judg 9:44]] especially of marauding foray [[Hos.7.1|Hos 7:1]], c <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against*** [[Judg.9.33|Judg 9:33]]; [[Judg.9.44|Judg 9:44]]; [[1Sam.23.27|1Sam 23:27]]; [[1Sam.30.14|1Sam 30:14]] (insert <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] al), [[Job.1.17|Job 1:17]] c <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> [[1Sam.27.8|1Sam 27:8]]; [[1Sam.30.1|1Sam 30:1]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[1Chr.14.9|1Chr 14:9]]; [[1Chr.14.13|1Chr 14:13]]; [[2Chr.25.13|2Chr 25:13]]; [[2Chr.28.18|2Chr 28:18]] in [[1Sam.27.10|1Sam 27:10]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָן‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלֿ‎</span>) [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and others **Pi\`el** ***infinitive construct***<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפַשֵּׁט‎</span>, with accusative of person [[1Sam.31.8|1Sam 31:8]] ***to strip the slain*** = [[1Chr.10.8|1Chr 10:8]] absolute ***only to strip*** (that is, the slain) [[2Sam.23.10|2Sam 23:10]] (insert also \|\| [[1Chr.11.13|1Chr 11:13]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִפְשִׁיט‎</span> [[Job.19.9|Job 19:9]] 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִפְשִׁיטוךְ‎</span> [[Ezek.23.26|Ezek 23:26]] etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּפְשֵׁט‎</span> [[Num.20.28|Num 20:28]] 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַפְשִׁיטֶנָּה‎</span> [[Hos.2.5|Hos 2:5]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּפְשִׁט֑וּן‎</span> [[Mic.2.8|Mic 2:8]], etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפְשֵׁט‎</span> [[Num.20.26|Num 20:26]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפְשִׁיט‎</span> [[2Chr.29.34|2Chr 29:34]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַפְשִׁיטִים‎</span> [[2Chr.35.11|2Chr 35:11]] — 

**1.** ***strip*** one ***of*** garment (2 accusative) [[Gen.37.23|Gen 37:23]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Num.20.26|Num 20:26]]; [[Num.20.28|Num 20:28]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִלְבִּישׁ‎</span>&gt;), [[Ezek.16.39|Ezek 16:39]]; [[Ezek.23.26|Ezek 23:26]] a. accusative of person alone [[1Chr.10.9|1Chr 10:9]]; [[Hos.2.5|Hos 2:5]] ***strip*** her (suffix) naked (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרֻמָּה‎</span>). 

**2.** ***strip off***, accusative<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֵּלָיו‎</span>[[1Sam.31.9|1Sam 31:9]], clothing [[Job.22.6|Job 22:6]] with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶדֶר‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִטּוּל‎</span> [[Mic.2.8|Mic 2:8]] with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺר‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> [[Mic.3.3|Mic 3:3]], compare (accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּבוֺדִי‎</span>) [[Job.19.9|Job 19:9]]. 

**3.** ***flay***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֹלָה‎</span> [[Lev.1.6|Lev 1:6]]; [[2Chr.29.4|2Chr 29:4]] accusative omitted [[2Chr.35.11|2Chr 35:11]]. **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְפַּשֵּׁט‎</span> [[1Sam.18.4|1Sam 18:4]] ***he stripped himself of*** his garment (accusative).
